vidis.data
Class AUserPacket

java.lang.Object
  vidis.data.mod.AUserComponent
      vidis.data.AUserPacket
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserComponent, IUserPacket
Direct Known Subclasses:
ADemoPacket, ElectionPacket, ElectionWinPacket, FloodPacket, VectorClockAlgorithmPacket
public abstract class AUserPacket
extends AUserComponent
implements IUserPacket

abstract user packet represents a packet by a user; module writers should use this class to write their own packet

Author:
dominik

execute

public final void execute()
Description copied from interface: IUserComponent
this function is executed on each simulation step NOTE: it is impossible to tell which of the components executes first! NOTE2: do NOT use Thread.sleep() or something like that - it will only hang the simulator NOTE3: use built-in sleep() and interrupt() functions!

Specified by:
execute in interface IUserComponent

getVariable

public final AVariable getVariable(String identifier)
Description copied from interface: IUserComponent
This function can be used to retrieve a user-scope set variable from the Simulator. If you specified a variable in the .msim configuration file you will retrieve it here as a String

Specified by:
getVariable in interface IUserComponent
Parameters:

Returns:
